subtitle: hello over the past year you've watched as we worked on many different spirit
science projects we started a Nutrition series touched upon the source field
talked about psychedelic history opened up the discussion on Kabbalah and we
even made a new batch of spirit shirts however while we were making these
projects we have been cooking up our largest undertaking yet and today we're
excited to reveal this secret endeavor patch Tarot the spirit science tarot
deck now in essence the Tarot itself can be likened to a pictographic card based
diagram of the universe the physical mental emotional spiritual and the path
of the soul through the totality of life experiences are all described by these
cards it is a map to make sense of your life a blueprint to navigate your
relationships and a guide to ascension a language to help you understand the way
in which the universe is speaking to you most of us probably know that Tarot is
nothing new so why make a new deck the pre-existing tarot decks are amazing but
they are often very divided in their symbolism and meaning such as those
between the two primary forerunners of Tarot symbolism today the rider-waite
and both Tarot we've spent countless hours studying and
researching in order to understand the unique archetypes described by the
various decks reconciling the paradoxes between them and then illustrating these
new cards in such a way that they may be understood by everyone the result is a
deck which is hard-coded to Kabbalah numerology astrology and sacred geometry
making it incredibly resonant and in tune with the cosmic laws and natural
celestial cycles that are at work all around us you can then use these cards
as a tool to support you in interpreting and navigating the waters of life and to
help you make sense of everything that's happening inside and around you this has
been our principle project for over a year now and while we've got a lot more
videos about them coming soon this one is just to let you know that we've
opened up the pre-order which comes with a free digital copy of the 500 page book
of patch our own mega Tarot superbug to pre-order and learn more check out
spirit science central com Turo thank you for watching and we'll
see you again real soon
you
you
